name: TheApartment-IAT313
description:
The Apartment is a choice-based narrative pixel game that is created using Unity. Players will take on the role of Walter, a young man who has been neglecting his personal relationships in favor of his job. However, he is given an ultimatum by his girlfriend, Skylar to find a balance to his work and personal life or she will leave him. She gives him 3 days to show he can change and makes him promise to be home before dinner. 

The player then follows Walter through his day, making choices on what he spends time on, being mindful of his promise to be home on time. These player choices will dictate the state of the couple’s relationship at the end of the game.

by Renee Sun, Nika Styk, Jessy Huang, Yuanshan Liu
